feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:09 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 08:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: ESE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Snow with ice pellets this afternoon and with freezing rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain this evening then to flurries overnight. Fog patches late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
